1: <pb/><t>Ix yalanxi vin̈aj Job chi' icha tic:</t>
2: <t>¿B'aq'uin̈ val ol eyactej e tzuntzan ovaj in yaelal tic, tzeyac'an cus in c'ol yed' juntzan̈ e lolonel tic?</t>
3: <t>Ayexn̈ejoch eyalan chucal lolonel d'ayin. ¿Tom max ex q'uixvi eyalan d'ayin?</t>
4: <t>Q'uinaloc yel ay in mul chi', ¿tom tzeyab' syail yuuj?</t>
5: <t>Tzeyic' val chaan̈ e b'a d'ayin yuj in yaelal tic, tzeyalanoch d'a in sat to chuc in.</t>
6: <t>Palta comonoc snachajel eyuuj to a Dios icha tic tzin utani. A' ix in ac'anem d'a yol jun yaal tic.</t>
7: <t>Scomon el vav, svalan icha tic: Svab' val in chami, xin chi. Palta malaj mach stac'vi d'ayin. Tzin nib'ej ay mach tzin colani, palta malaj mach sb'oan yaj d'ayin.</t>
8: <t>A Dios ix macan yol in b'e, yic maxtzac yal in b'eyeq'ui. Ichato d'a scal q'uic'alq'uinal tzin ec' yuuj.</t>
9: <t>Ix yiq'uec' in b'eyumal, ix yic'anec' snivanil velc'ochi.</t>
10: <t>Ix in satem d'a juneln̈ej. A tas ayoch yipoc in c'ool, pilan ix lajviel icha junoc te te' malaj sch'an̈al yib'.</t>
11: <t>Ix seccot yoval sc'ool d'a vib'an̈, icha val junoc yajc'ool ix in yutej.</t>
12: <t>Masanil eb' soldado Dios chi' ix och oyan d'ayin. Ix oymaj eb' d'a spatictac in pat yic syac'an oval eb' ved'oc.</t>
13: <t>A Dios chi' ix ic'anel eb' vuc'tac yed' eb' vamigo d'a in tz'ey, ichaxon̈ej junoc comon anima ix in yutejcan eb'.</t>
14: <t>A eb' ayto vuj in b'a yed'oc yed' eb' vamigo, ix in yactejcan eb', ix in b'atcan satc'olal yuj eb'.</t>
15: <t>Axo eb' cajan d'a in pat yed' masanil eb' in checab', icha junoc ch'oc animail ix in ajcan d'a eb', maxtzac in yilochlaj eb'.</t>
16: <t>Tato svavtejcot junoc eb' in checab' chi', maxtzac tac'vilaj eb' d'ayin, vach'chom tzin tevi d'a eb'.</t>
17: <t>Ayic tzin c'och d'a stz'ey ix vetb'eyum, chuclaj sjab' xob'al in ti' syab' ix, axo eb' ayto vuj in b'a yed'oc, tzin syajel eb'.</t>
18: <t>Icha pax chi' eb' unin tzin spatiquejel eb'. Ayic syilan eb' veq'ui sb'uchvaj eb' d'ayin.</t>
19: <t>A val eb' ec'b'al te vach' vac'an yed'oc, tzin spatiquejel eb'. A val eb' tzin te tzalaj yed'oc, ix meltzajoch eb' ajc'olal d'ayin.</t>
20: <t>Toxo ix tacjioch in tz'umal yed' in b'ac'chil d'a in b'aquil, tevelxon̈ej pitzan in.</t>
21: <t>Ex vamigo, oc'ocab' e c'ool d'ayin, yujto a Dios ix ac'ancot jun yaelal tic d'a vib'an̈.</t>
22: <t>¿Tas yuj tzac'anexn̈ej vuuj, icha tzin yutej Dios? ¿Tom man̈ c'ocb'ilocxo in eyac'an cusoc?</t>
23: <t>Ayoc val mach stz'ib'ancan juntzan̈ in lolonel tic. Comonoc tz'ac'chajcanoch d'a q'uen q'ueen.</t>
24: <t>Comonoc a yed' q'uen cincel nab'a hierro tz'ac'jicanoch d'a q'uen q'ueen yic scan d'a juneln̈ej.</t>
25: <t>Vojtac to a in Columal pitzann̈ej, axo d'a slajvub' c'ual ol emul d'a sat lum tic yic tzin scolani.</t>
26: <t>Vach'chom slajviel in tz'umal tic, palta ol vil val och Dios yed' in nivanil tic.</t>
27: <t>A in val lac'an ol vil val och yed' in sat, man̈ ch'ococ mach ol ilanoc.</t> <t>Vanxo slajvic'och vip svab'i.</t>
28: <t>Ayic svab'an eyalan icha tic: ¿Tas val scutej cac'an cus sc'ol vin̈, yujto munil a vin̈ tz'ic'ancot syaelal chi' d'a yib'an̈? xe chi.</t>
29: <t>Palta xivan̈ec d'a q'uen espada, aton yoval sc'ol Dios syac'lab'ej d'a eb' sc'ulan chucal. Ojtaquejequeli to ay jun Dios tzon̈ ch'olb'itani, xchi vin̈aj Job chi'.</t>
